description:
Yamaoto is carrying Lal Mirch, who is unconscious.  He wanders the Merone Base. Doors and hatches in the passageways automatically open and close. They appear to be leading him somewhere. Lal Mirch gives a moan. She has regained consciousness. But, she is unable to understand the situation. She asks Gokudera questions and tries to sort out the battle thus far. She realizes that it has only been a few hours since they have broken into Merone Base…
Source: crunchyroll
